messages.title: It's a two horse race - The Establishment V The People's Party

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cost of living is rising, Broxtowe residents feeling the pinch, youth unemployment rising.
UKIP will safeguard the NHS from privatisation and stop health tourism. UKIP will abolish hospital car parking charges.
UKIP wants to end uncontrolled immigration by adopting a points based policy similar to Australia and Canada. This will ease pressure on school places, housing and the NHS.
UKIP Broxtowe want to hold local referendums on local housing building and major infrastructure planning, like arguing against HS2.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Leave the EU & Grow the Economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Save paying £55 million a day for EU membership and giving away another £23 million a day in foreign aid. Reinvest in Britain.
